name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Email Engineer with strong expertise in Email Marketing, A/B Testing, Automation, and CRM tools. Proven ability to apply analytical thinking and solution-oriented strategies to enhance customer engagement through effective email campaigns. Experienced in utilizing **Figma** for designing user-centric email templates, implementing segmentation techniques to tailor communications, and optimizing workflows to improve marketing performance. Demonstrates structured work habits and a proactive approach to problem-solving. Additionally, I bring over 10 years of software development experience, proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a full stack background encompassing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My experience with cloud-native application development on **Azure** and **AWS**, as well as a solid foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, complements my skills in building impactful solutions that meet compliance standards.
